description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) to planning permission 205321FUL dated 02.09.2022 for "Construction of four-storey building to provide 1no. commercial unit at ground floor level and 6no. self-contained residential units; and provision of associated amenity space, refuse and cycle storage (following demolition of existing building)". Amendments seeks front ground & first floor elevation proposed to be white render rather than white textured brickwork; slight alteration in timber sash window design on the front elevation to match neighbour (no.137)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 20-042-E01 (Existing OS Plan), 20-042-E02 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 20-042-E03 (Existing First Floor Plan), 20-042-E04 (Existing Roof Plan), 20-042-E05 (Existing Front Elevation North Facing), 20-042-E06 (Existing Rear Elevation South Facing A-A), 20-042-E07 (Existing Rear Elevation South Facing BB), 20-042-E08 (Existing Section A-A), 20-042-P 01 (Proposed OS Plan), 20- 042-P02 Rev A (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 20-042-P03 Rev A (Proposed First Floor Plan), 20-042-P04 (Proposed Second Floor Plan), 20-042-P05 Rev A (Proposed Third Floor Plan), 20-042-P06 (Proposed Roof Plan), 7418/NMA/03, 20-042-P08 Rev B (Proposed Rear Elevation South Facing), 20-042-P09 Rev A (Proposed Section A-A), and Planning, Design + Access Statement prepared by Red + White dated December 2020.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
